13.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c8f1f806-e5cd-4bc9-ac76-22a7d742d440/DANONE 13.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"DANONE 13.PNG\",\"name\":\"DANONE 13.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c8f1f806-e5cd-4bc9-ac76-22a7d742d440\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":437,\"height\":77},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hub and Spoke Model – OneSource is designed using a HUB and SPOKE model.  While HUB and SPOKE Resource Groups will contain identical services, applications, and policies, they are reserved for separate but not mutually exclusive User Groups.  The HUB is intended for use by Global (cross regional and corporate) teams.  SPOKEs are intended for regional teams.  The number of SPOKEs and the geographic zones that they represent are dictated by the OneSource governance committee.  There is no theoretical limit on the number of SPOKES and are only limited by practical considerations of performance (proximity to data sources) and administrative teams.  SPOKEs are implemented within a single Azure Region, but the Administrative teams managing SPOKEs are not constrained by geography.  Multiple virtual SPOKEs could co-exist within a single Azure Region.  The intent is to streamline Administration and Support requirements and to enable high performance administration by geographically adjacent teams (regional time zone).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Onesource product line environment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Product Line Environment (PLE) is environment where Data Product can be produced at are few main types of PLE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Default PLE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - PLE with a predefined set of services and infrastructure. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rSensitive PLE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - PLE for ingesting/processing confidential data and building appropriate DPs. It includes Obfuscated Framework will work inside of this Sensitive PLE.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rCustom
